Experience and support

that is proven to make a difference

The Sober Living Experience

Resolutions Recovery is more than a sober living environment we are a sober living experience.

What sets us apart from other SLE’s is the high quality of service and customized level of care we provide to each of our clients. With significant experience in addiction and recovery, our staff is well equipped to guide and support our clients in their journey to independence, self-discovery and a successful design for living.

We know first-hand the challenges that face those overcoming addiction and are here with you every step of the way. Our main goal is to provide a safe and comfortable living environment where you can acquire the tools necessary to make your recovery and new life the most successful it can be. We provide the resources that you need, you put them into action to succeed.

Call for more information or to set up an appointment to visit one of our properties. (925) 428-1417

Let Resolutions Recovery help you achieve a lifetime of sustainable recovery.

Experience and support

that is proven to make a difference

Case Management

Clients of Resolutions Recovery sober living residences receive customized weekly meetings with a drug and alcohol counselor at our office location.

We also offer case management services to individuals residing outside RR homes.

Services may include:

  • Weekly or biweekly meetings
  • Drug and alcohol testing
  • Learning to budget
  • Time management skills
  • Collaboration with treatment team

Testimonials

“Resolutions has helped me tremendously in my recovery. I’m not sure I’d still be sober without moving into sober living. The support of my housemates and knowing that I’m coming home to a safe and supportive place makes all the difference.”

Tyler

“I was hesitant to move into sober living after treatment, but I am so glad I did! Case management with Eileen has really helped me open up about some things I am going through and I enjoy the peaceful environment of this house. I love this place!”

Meghan

“I have formed a solid foundation at Resolutions. They provide a safe, supportive place to come home to every night and they go above and beyond with the little things. Their houses are high-end and not overcrowded like most other sober homes I’ve stayed at.”

Paul

“When I moved into Resolutions, I was greeted with overwhelming kindness. I truly believe that they care about each of their clients and their individual journey in recovery. The support of the other people I live with is phenomenal! For the first time in a long time, I have hope for my future.”

Danielle

TIBURON

Our upscale Tiburon location boasts stunning views of the San Francisco Bay from nearly every room. Our home provides an open and welcoming feel and sits on just over an acre of land. The friendly atmosphere allows for camaraderie while still providing each resident with plenty of private space for relaxing and personal space for storage.

SAN RAFAEL

Our Mission home is conveniently located in downtown central San Rafael, just minutes to some of Marin’s best restaurants, hiking trails, public transportation as well as many of the best IOP programs in the county. Our beautiful split-level Grand Victoria home provides six private and semi-private bedrooms with a large and spacious living area and a relaxing atmosphere.

Contact Us   (925) 727-5774

About Us

Eileen N.

Eileen is the co-owner and Chief Financial Officer of Resolutions Recovery. She is also the Case Manager for the clients of Resolutions and brings understanding and solutions to the many challenges that the clients face adjusting to life on life’s terms. Eileen is a graduate of the Addiction Studies program through the California Consortium of Addiction Programs and Professionals and as valedictorian of her class, she understands the importance of continued education.

With 30+ years in recovery from alcoholism and codependency Eileen’s commitment to helping others recover is evident in the years of service with taking 12 step meetings into jails and institutions and sponsoring hundreds of women over the years. Through her own recovery as well as her work with others Eileen understands the struggles that the clients face as well as the many joys that recovery brings.

Jona D.

As co-founder of Resolutions Recovery, Jona’s commitment to recovery began in 2005 with her personal journey. Her time in sober living provided the foundation necessary to begin creating the life she has today. She earned a bachelor’s degree in psychology from Chapman University in 2010 and began working in the recovery field shortly thereafter. Jona has found great joy in connecting with clients, their families, and other professionals in the community. The work that Jona does at Resolutions Recovery has a significant impact on her client’s lives and Resolutions’ communities.

Jona has a heart and passion for working with individuals and families in recovery. Her compassion and concern for people is substantial and is reflected in all she does. Her radiant personality coupled with her dedication to her work and recovery, makes her a critical part of Resolutions success.

Jona’s first priority is her family – son Dante and Dominic are the inspiration for all her hard work, drive and determination. Having just completed her first year, Jona is currently in the process of finishing her Master’s degree from Southern New Hampshire University. Jona’s canine companions, Lois and Cooper are another great source of joy for her, and are her loyal mascots. In her down time, Jona enjoys spending quality time with her family and friends.

Jack T.

Philadelphia born and California raised, Jack joined Resolutions Recovery with 3+ years of Sober Living management experience. Before joining Resolutions Recovery, Jack managed 4 homes for C.A.S.T.L.E. Marin. He spent 15 years in Investment Banking prior to getting sober in early 2015. His stellar organizational skills, cleanliness and sincere care for the still suffering addict/alcoholic has made him an integral part of many peoples sober living success story. Jack is a natural born mentor and finds his passion in helping men and women develop personal accountability, spiritual growth, self-esteem, integrity and most importantly, sobriety. With help from others, Jack has developed a system that encapsulates every reason of why sober living environments were created in the first place.

Resolutions Recovery

Resolutions Recovery provides customized, individual support services and sober living homes in Marin County, California. Our goal is to provide the essential support that assists each unique client in developing the skills required to create a life of sustainable recovery.
